channel.title: Sinister Pk New [718] Perfection!
channel.description:
[CENTER]Join Us at [url=http://www.sinisterpk.com]SinisterPk[/url] Play Now at [url=http://www.sinisterpk.com/play.php]SinisterPk Webclient[/url] Download Our Client at [url=http://www.sinisterpk.com/SinisterPk.jar]www.sinisterpk.com/SinisterPk.jar[/url][/CENTER]
Hey guys! welcome to the advertisement of Sinister Pk! We are a new 718 server that just opened up, and we need new dedicated players. Of course this means that there are no staff, so we need staffs. This server is updated daily, to deliver the best contents! I hope you guys decide to join us in our great adventure!
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/12.jpg[/img]
Pk'ing spots
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/11.jpg[/img]
Mini-Games
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/10.png[/img]
Bossing Teleports
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/9.jpg[/img]
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/20.jpg[/img]
Dungeoneering fully working with a shop!
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/6.jpg[/img]
Global Teleports to get around easily
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/5.png[/img]
Players Stat Info
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/4.jpg[/img]
We have clan slayer!
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/3.jpg[/img]
This is how you claim your stuff!
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/2.jpg[/img]
We also have Daily Tasks!
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/1.jpg[/img]
We have Quick Prayers!
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/21.jpg[/img]
We have construction! Working on perfecting it!
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/22.jpg[/img]
Custom minigames perfected!
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/23.jpg[/img]
We have Runecafting!
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/24.jpg[/img]
Perfect Farming w/ a shop!
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/26.jpg[/img]
We have Glacors!
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/25.jpg[/img]
We have Hunter aswell!
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/27.jpg[/img]
Perfect Lodestones to get to cities faster
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/28.jpg[/img]
Perfect Dwarf Cannon!
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/29.jpg[/img]
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/30.jpg[/img]
Perfect Wildywyrm!
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/31.jpg[/img]
Perfect Chaos Elemental!
[img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/32.jpg[/img] [img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/33.jpg[/img] [img]http://sinisterpk.com/extimg/34.jpg[/img]
Many custom donation options!
We are updated daily!
Some Updates- [CODE]1. Fixed every single xp rate for skills 2. Added wild agility course teleport 3. Added Glacors 4. Fixed the amount of hits a dragon breath hits on antifire potion + anti-fire shield 5. Added chaos elemental 6. Added dagganoths 7. Fixed QBD teleport 8. Fixed Lodes stone teleports 9. Added Troll Invasion minigame 10. Added wildywyrm and ice strykewyrms 11. Fixed corp beast safe spot 12. Added crashing star 13. Added Donator shop for donator points 14. Added Donator Shops in donator zone that sell stuff for gp 15. Added Farming 16. Added Hunter 17. Items over 5m can't be sold to shop [FIX] 18. Added Skill Point System 19. Added Daily Task System 20. Fixed SOF item rarity 21. Added Clan Slayer 22. Added Statistics Panel 23. Added Trivia 24. Added Dwarf multi Cannon 25. Added Slayer Shop 26. Added Slayer Helmet 27. Added Upgrade donator lamp 28. Added dicing 29. Added Runecrafting 30. Added Essence mining 31. Fixed Hunter xp 32. Added crystal chest 33. Fixed Smithing exp 34. Fixed Herblore glitch with unf pots [/CODE]

item.title: Sinister Pk New [718] Perfection!
item.dc:creator: @sinisterpk sinisterpk
item.description:
@sinisterpk wrote:

The client is normal size for a 718. I can post a virus scan if anyone wants.

item.title: Sinister Pk New [718] Perfection!
item.dc:creator: @Learning_Code Learning Code
item.description:
@Learning_Code wrote:

Why is your downloadable client 4.03MB? That’s a little too big for a downloadable client, they’re usually around 390-500KB
